official_title: Condemning the National Rifle Association for holding its annual convention on the anniversary of the bombing of the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.

summary.text: Condemns the Board Members of the National Rifle Association for choosing April 19, 1996 (the anniversary of the bombing of the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building in Oklahoma) as the date for its 125th annual convention and for comparing Federal employees to Nazis, Storm Troopers, and Gestapo agents.

titles.title: Condemning the National Rifle Association for holding its annual convention on the anniversary of the bombing of the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.
